ValidationRule.description: If Area of Focus is Web Support other fields are required
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $Profile.Name <> "System Administrator", NOT(ISCHANGED(IsUpdateFromCaseComment__c)), ISPICKVAL(Area_of_Focus__c,'Web Support'), ( ISPICKVAL( Browser__c , '') || ISPICKVAL( Browser_Test__c , '') || ISBLANK( Customer_s_Operating_System__c ) || ISPICKVAL( Client_Logs_Screenshots_Attached__c , '') || ISBLANK( Web_URL__c ) ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: If your Area of Focus is Web Support, then you must populate a value in the following fields: Web URL, Browser, Browser Test, Customer's Operating System, and Client Logs/Screenshots Attached.
